casebody.data:
No. 131,

October Term, 1954.

Whitehouse et al. v. Illinois Central Railroad Co. et al., Kenneth F. Burgess and Walter J. Cummings, Jr. were on the petition for the Carrier Members, National Railroad Adjustment Board, Third Division, respondents. Milton Kramer in opposition.

349 U. S. 366. The petition for modification of the opinion is denied.

Mr. Justice Harlan took no part in the consideration or decision of this petition.
